H0.text: Whom did Malcolm III kill in battle in 1057 to become King of Scotland. Lulach

H1.text: Whom did Malcolm III kill in battle in 1057 to become King of Scotland. Duncan I

H2.text: Whom did Malcolm III kill in battle in 1057 to become King of Scotland. Kenneth III

H3.text: Whom did Malcolm III kill in battle in 1057 to become King of Scotland. MACBETH

A4.text: In 1057, various chroniclers report the death of Macbeth at Malcolm's hand, on 15 August 1057 at Lumphanan in Aberdeenshire.

A5.text: Lulach was killed by Malcolm, 'by treachery', near Huntly on 23 April 1058.
